# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(crypto-- LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/local/bin/clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/local/bin/clang++")
add_executable(crypto-- "")
set_target_properties(crypto-- PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "crypto--")
set_target_properties(crypto-- PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_compile_options(crypto-- PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
set_target_properties(crypto-- PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(crypto-- PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET crypto-- PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(crypto-- PRIVATE
    libtommath.a
)
target_link_options(crypto-- PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(crypto-- PRIVATE
    src/ecdsa.cpp
    src/des.cpp
    src/sm3.cpp
    src/aes.cpp
    src/sm4.cpp
    src/zuc.cpp
    src/crypto--.cpp
    src/tools.cpp
    src/rc4.cpp
    src/sha256.cpp
    src/ecc.cpp
    src/sts.cpp
    include/sha256.h
    include/stdbool.h
    include/crypto--.h
    include/sm3.h
    include/aes.h
    include/ecc.h
    include/ecdsa.h
    include/des.h
    include/zuc.h
    include/tools.h
    include/sm4.h
    include/sts.h
    include/rc4.h
    include/fileproc.h
)
